descriptionHtml:
Shihni's Merged Mods

After using and being frustrated with the excessive mods in alternative packages, I created my own.Â  This is a group of modular packages, designed to be plug and play for a STEPP installation.

The Graphics module contains the following:

[list]
[*]AOF Detailed Mountains
[*]AOF Farmhouse
[*]Ash Pile Retex
[*]Bellyaches Animal & Creature Pack
[*]Bryce Nebula
[*]Designs of the Nords
[*]Detailed Chests
[*]Detailed Rugs
[*]Hectrol Caves Deluxe
[*]Hectrol Spider Webs
[*]HD Ivy
[*]HQ Food & Ingredients
[*]HQ LODs
[*]HQ Paper
[*]HQ Towns & Villages
[*]Hybrid's HD Plants & Herbs Retexture
[*]Langley's WMS Textures Workshop
[*]No Stretching
[*]Parallax Treebark

[*]Pilgrim's Delight
[*]Purity II

[*]Quality Snowflakes V2
[*]Radiant Unique Potions & Potions
[*]Real Ice ALL-IN-ONE
[*]Real Ice and Snow (RIS)
[*]Realistic Instruments
[*]Realistic Smoke & Embers
[*]Re-Defined Dungeons
[*]Riften HQ Textures
[*]Ruins Clutter Improved
[*]Septim HD
[*]Silly Level of Detail - Potions and poisons
[*]Silly Level of Detail - Wine Cellar
[*]Simply Bigger Trees /w Slower Brances

[*]Serious HD Texture
[*]Silly Level of Detail - Potions and poisons
[*]Silly Level of Detail - Wine Cellar
[*]Skyrim Flora Overhaul

[*]Skyrim HD
[*]Skyrim Realistic Overhaul
[*]Skyrim Redesigned
[*]Skyrim Ultra HD Texture Pack
[*]Snow & Rocks Textures HD
[*]SMIM
[*]Super Realistic Ore Textures
[*]The Beauty of Skyrim - Caves & Mines
[*]The Beauty of Skyrim - Dungeons
[*]Tobes Highres Textures
[*]TreesHD Skyrim variation
[*]Visible Windows
[*]Vivid Weathers

[*]Weathered Road Signs

[/list]
The Character module contains the following:

[list]
[*]CBBE Curvy with Bodyslide
[*]Sundracon Flaccid with Younger/Geonox Merged faces

[*]Apache Sky Hair with optional installations (extra male and female hairs)

[*]HN66 Long Eyelashes
[*]Natural Eyes
[*]Iridum Eyes
[*]CBBE Non-Skimpy replacer
[*]Realistic Force
[*]XP32 Maximum Skeleton
[*]HDT Physics
[*]Racemenu
[*]Race Compatibility patch

[/list]
The QoL module is a WIP

[list]
[/list]
author: Shihni
